sub_title: Biotech entrepreneur | COO at BIMINI Biotech | Principal at FFUND | Director Stichting Darmgezondheid
summary:
Thank you for visiting my Linkedin profile,

I have a background in biomedical sciences and immunology and majored in management, policy analysis and entrepreneurship. I obtained my PhD focusing on stimulating innovation in the field of probiotics and the microbiota. Since, I have been working as a business consultant for biotech and life Science organisations, successfully boosting their innovation performance. In this role, I have been involved in securing strategic financing and supporting innovation for academia, start-ups and innovative SMEs. In my role as COO at BIMINI Biotech, we aim to bring novel oncology therapeutics to the market.

I am passionate about making an meaningful impact on society by accelerating innovations in the Health and Life Sciences.

In addition, I am active as a board member of Stichting Darmgezondheid, an independent online platform providing information regarding the gut and gut Health to a wide audience (incl. patients, health professionals and interested people). We aim to become the knowledge hub on the gut and gut Health.

I am always open for questions, discussions or a nice cup of coffee. Please do not hesitate to contact me.
